text: Hello, I am Shishir Roy and I am currently pursuing my MTech in Artificial Intelligence
at the Institute of Science, Bangalore.
I am proficient in CE, C++, Python, SQL, PyTorch and Latex.
During my tenure at ISC, I have had the privilege of delving deep into the mathematical background
of classical as well as state-of-the-art machine learning and deep learning algorithms.
In addition to this, I have implemented many of these algorithms which shows my capabilities
does not stop at the theoretical knowledge.
I have done a course in NLP during my second semester at ISC.
As a consequence, I have had the chance to read and implement many of the groundbreaking
research papers which includes Valtuwek, Engram models, recurrent neural networks, sequence
to sequence, encoder-decoder, long short-term memory networks, transformers and many more.
These experiences coupled with my involvement in projects at the Spectrum Lab focusing on
image processing showcases my versatility and ability to tackle diverse challenges.
What sets me apart is not just my technical proficiency but also my passion for continuous
learning and collaboration.
I am eager to join Amazon, a hub of innovation where I can contribute my expertise while learning
from the best in the field.
Together, I believe we can push the boundaries of NLP and shape a future where technology
truly understands and empowers humanity.
Thank you for considering my application.
I am excited about the opportunity to bring my skills and enthusiasm to the team at Amazon.
Let's create something extraordinary together.
Have a fantastic day!
